candidates.name: Jacques Windell
candidates.why_elect: I am very tenacious, as my 3 year fight with the lines issue at central government level proves. I am also not scared to take on Ministers if I have to. Our voice will be heard and I will not be denied. That's my promise to you.
candidates.why_stand: I am running for Mayor because I believe we need a fearless leader who will not accept the lunacy of some of the compliance laws central government is forcing on us. Robust push-back is critical, as a matter of urgency to save our towns!
